snippet: BERRIGAN--Rev. Daniel J.,S.J., on April 30, 2016. Reposing at the Church of St. Francis Xavier, 46 W. 16th Street, New York, NY 10011 on Thursday, 2-5 and 7-9pm. A Mass of Christian Burial will be held at the Church of St. Francis Xavier on Friday, 10am. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Northeast Province of the Society of Jesus, 39 E. 83rd Street, New York, NY 10028. Interment at the Jesuit Cemetery, Auriesville, NY. For information, contact Farenga Bros. Inc., Directors, (718) 654-0500. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BERRIGAN, REV. DANIEL J.
